changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ruleform.relationship_chain ( id bigserial NOT NULL, input1 bigint NOT NULL, input2 bigint NOT NULL, result bigint NOT NULL, notes character varying, research bigint, updated_by bigint NOT NULL, update_date timestamp with time zone NOT NULL DEFAULT ('now'::text)::timestamp(6) with time zone, CONSTRAINT relationship_chain_pkey PRIMARY KEY (id ), CONSTRAINT relationship_chain_relationship1_fkey FOREIGN KEY (input1) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT relationship_chain_relationship2_fkey FOREIGN KEY (input2) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT relationship_chain_relationship3_fkey FOREIGN KEY (result) REFERENCES ruleform.relationship (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT relationship_chain_research_fkey FOREIGN KEY (research) REFERENCES ruleform.research (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT relationship_chain_updated_by_fkey FOREIGN KEY (updated_by) REFERENCES ruleform.resource (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE NO ACTION DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, CONSTRAINT relationship_chain_relationship1_key UNIQUE (input1 , input2 ) ) WITH ( OIDS=FALSE );
